details: I was a bit skeptical switching from PC to Mac after all of these years but I couldn't be happier. This MacBook Air is so sleek and smooth. Though getting used to a new OS may take a little time, it was well worth spending a little extra money to get such a solid computer.
name: Witt Hayden

details: Fantabulous design and built quality. Tremendous and long lasting battery life. Smoothest, bigger and multifunctional touchpad. Superb picture quality and screen harmless for our eyes. Very comfortable to hold in a single hand. Overall a must buy even if you aren't a fan of mac!!
name: Crosby Hickman

details: This is a phenomenal laptop. It's fast, light, and beautiful. The speakers are surprisingly good, while the Retina screen is a sight to behold if this is your first laptop with this kind of resolution.I run games and video editing on it, and I've had no problems so far.
name: Monroe Dale

details: I bought this MacBook Pro because I am working on my MBA and I wanted a new MacBook Pro with great battery life and excellent quality fit and finish. I appreciate the fine things in life, and along with my other Apple products I was not disappointed.
name: Lawanda Cannon

details: The Retina display is absolutely stunning and easy on the eyes. Light, sleek design. Easy to connect all your devices and perfect for on the go use, as I bought it for college. This review is from Apple - MacBook Pro
name: Delia Parker

details: This is the first Mac that I have used. I have only ever had a Lenovo and was skeptical to switch to apple despite having all other apple devices.I would say that the only downside is how expensive it was but I would have to say that it is worth it.
name: Wiggins Ballard
